Type.BattleDialog: Prepare yourselves, this won't be simple.
Well done you two! What's say we collect those books and have ourselves a proper feast hm?
No... I have to... I have to protect them...
Steady now. I have your back.
Bastards! Face me instead!
Take a breather, I'll cover you.
You fought well.
I will protect them, no matter the cost.
Stay strong you two, we're almost done here.
...Guys, the Nymane Key is reacting to this place. It's absorbing power!
That was too close. This had better be worth it.
H-help me!!
No!!
Erode into dust.
Feel the strands of time wear you away.
Come on, we've almost got them all!
Careful with that thing Linus, I'm not gonna forgive you if you accidentally erase the universe or something.
Gee I... I hope they'll be okay?
Huff... Huff... Can't... keep going...
They're too strong!
They also turn into books when they die?
Just give up already!
Sorry, you didn't leave us much choice.
